function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rising prevalence of loneliness during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Promoting social connections through remote means, support networks, and mental health services","Technologies":"Social media data analysis, online community platforms","People":"Individuals experiencing loneliness, especially during quarantine and social distancing","Owner":"Health authorities, mental health professionals, community support organizations"},{"Description":"Minimal attention on the issue of loneliness during previous pandemics (SARS and MERS)","Impact":"Underestimation of the impact of loneliness on mental health","Mitigation":"Incorporating loneliness research into pandemic response planning, public health campaigns, and support services","Technologies":"Data analysis, mental health research","People":"Policy makers, public health agencies","Owner":"Researchers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Need for close-to-real-time data on loneliness-related sentiments","Impact":"Limited understanding of evolving loneliness-related sentiments during a pandemic","Mitigation":"Utilizing social media data analysis tools for real-time sentiment analysis, developing online communities for support and discussion","Technologies":"Social media data analysis tools, sentiment analysis algorithms","People":"Policy makers, mental health professionals","Owner":"Data analysts, technology companies"}]}
